=== Security Team Weekly Summary for 9 June 2017 ===

The <nowiki>[[SecurityTeam|Security Team]]</nowiki> weekly reports are intended to be very short summaries of the Security Team's weekly activities. 

If you would like to reach the Security Team, you can find us at the #ubuntu-hardened channel on FreeNode. Alternatively, you can mail the Ubuntu Hardened mailing list at: ubuntu-hardened@lists.ubuntu.com

During the last week, the Ubuntu Security team:
* Triaged 191 public security vulnerability reports, retaining the 63 that applied to Ubuntu.
* Published 13 Ubuntu Security Notices which fixed 35 security issues (CVEs) across 15 supported packages.

==== Ubuntu Security Notices ====
* [[https://www.ubuntu.com/usn/usn-3306-1|[USN-3306-1] libsndfile vulnerabilities ]]
* [[https://www.ubuntu.com/usn/usn-3307-1|[USN-3307-1] OpenLDAP vulnerability ]]
* [[https://www.ubuntu.com/usn/usn-3308-1|[USN-3308-1] Puppet vulnerabilities ]]
* [[https://www.ubuntu.com/usn/usn-3309-1|[USN-3309-1] Libtasn1 vulnerability ]]
* [[https://www.ubuntu.com/usn/usn-3310-1|[USN-3310-1] lintian vulnerability ]]
* [[https://www.ubuntu.com/usn/usn-3311-1|[USN-3311-1] libnl vulnerability ]]
* [[https://www.ubuntu.com/usn/usn-3312-1|[USN-3312-1] Linux kernel vulnerabilities ]]
* [[https://www.ubuntu.com/usn/usn-3312-2|[USN-3312-2] Linux kernel (Xenial HWE) vulnerabilities ]]
* [[https://www.ubuntu.com/usn/usn-3313-1|[USN-3313-1] Linux kernel vulnerability ]]
* [[https://www.ubuntu.com/usn/usn-3313-2|[USN-3313-2] Linux kernel (HWE) vulnerability ]]
* [[https://www.ubuntu.com/usn/usn-3314-1|[USN-3314-1] Linux kernel vulnerabilities ]]
* [[https://www.ubuntu.com/usn/usn-3316-1|[USN-3316-1] FreeRADIUS vulnerability ]]
* [[https://www.ubuntu.com/usn/usn-3253-2|[USN-3253-2] Nagios regression ]]
